title: Did St. Patrick survey the African tribe of Pigmy, Ireland's first resident?
subtitle: A long-standing theory of ancient Irish history describes the genocide of the Twa dwarfs, as claimed by the original source of the myth "leprechaun."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: St. Patrick led the genocide of a band of twa 'Bigme' from Central Africa, who were the natives of Ireland.
